item.description:
When
Saturday, December 29, 2007 at 8:00 PM 20071230T010000Z
Where
New Tiki Lounge
355 Littleton Rd
Westford , MA 01886
978-692-2355
Who should come
Everyone welcome, whether you sing or not.
Why
If you like to sing, this is great. If you like to dance or even if you just like to watch and socialize, this is also good.
How to find the organizer(s)
"I'll wear my baseball cap that says "NEIL" on it."
--NeilL
item.how_to_find_us: Neil and Mark are organizing this.
item.name: Karaoke Night - Merrimack Singles Group
